_aChangeLog.text: Applied all stripper fixes from v2_4b. This means you no longer need a stripper to play the map.
Fixed a client crash in the map due to an M249 sound being packed in.
Made a breakable wall in stage 2 more visible.
Increased the radius of the grenade launcher projectile to be 256 units in diameter (from 128)
Fixed point-blank shooting of the shotgun not pushing nor damaging zombies
Increased the push of the shotgun to 700u/s (from 625u/s)
Fixed the ending of RTV stage killing humans too.
Fixed radar being tinted green on alive players.
Fixed Extreme 2 and Extreme Insanity not having any music in the beginning what so ever.
Added back Henry to the credits list.
Now includes decompiled technology (I lost the original VMF)

_sText:
I don't even know what to type here. I guess.....

"An unknown force has set hold in the laboratory. Make your way to the surface and destroy the laboratory and escape before you die!"

Map by Pasas1345
Boss model from StarCraft II
Some Textures by TopHATTWaffle

There is a Stripper Fix included with the since there are some bug-fixes (some are game-breaking) and balance changes. If you are going to offline this map no need but for servers it is necessary.

The stripper fix is no longer necessary as v2_4c has brought over the stripper fixes.

Originally created around 2018-2019. This used to be my first serious map and was in a much worse but now is in a state where I can upload this (and also have the courage to upload it here). Since this is a final version, I won't be touching this map anytime soon with major updates.

Includes
  • 4 main stages (2 normal and 2 extreme)
  • 1 extra stage (and maybe another if you even count that as a stage?)
  • Boss
  • Lasers (Kind of, most don't instakill and only one is)
  • 9 Items
  • 3 types of NPCs

I hope you enjoy!
